document.body:
Search over 3,500 puns
Puns about Food (Restaurants) Subcategory: Coffee · Restaurants · Bakers and Cooks · Drinks · Kinds of Food · Dieting · Misc. Food Puns 41. Harry and Clem the carpenters, argued mightily on how best to complete the dinette set they were working on. They finally agreed to table the discussion. dr dirt - Alaska 42. Having a rude waiter at an Ethiopian restaurant just adds insult to injera. Dr. Pun - Texas 43. Insulting an East Indian chef will bring you bad Korma. The Pundit - Tulsa 44. I walked into this posh restaurant, the prices were extortionate, it was daylight snobbery. egostate - Derby,UK 45. The Chinese pizzeria murder mystery genre is a novel dough mein. Kap'n Klystron - Nanuet, NY 46. The waiter was six foot eight, and handled many a tall order. 47. Some people use a restaurant to rest-and-rant. 48. If a restaurant isn't sweet to its chefs they might dessert. 49. When I treated my friends to lunch at the Mexican fast food restaurant I had to pay the taco bill. SGT Snorkel - Iowa 1 2 3 4 5
Vote for pun number : -select- 41. 42. 43. 44. 45. 46. 47. 48. 49. Awful Lame Okay Amusing Excellent
